title: Wayne's I mean Nick's World
name: Wayne's I mean Nick's World
description:
A Map by Bigb

The earth

properties.name: Bida, Nigeria
properties.description: Posted by BigbBida, Nigeria is where my mom and her family used to live. They lived there because her father liked to travel and he went over there to train Nigerian teachers. My mom always tells me crazy stories about things that happened there and about the native people. I\'ve always wondered what it would be like to grow up in Africa. Someday i would like to go where my mom lived and see what it\'s like. I\'m sure it would be a lot different from my life here in America.

properties.name: Chernobyl
properties.description: Posted by BigbRussiaChernobyl is the name of a power plant located in Russia. On April 26,1986 one of the reactors at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant exploded. This cause a fire to brake out damaging the other reactors and sending nuclear toxins all over Russia and Other parts of the world. As a result the whole area surrounding the power plant had to be evacuated. Only about 50 people died during the explosion, but it\'s estimated that around nine thousand have died from cancer that was caused by the incident. The area closly surrounding the plant is still abondond till this day.

properties.name: Colosseum
properties.description: Posted by BigbThe colosseum is located in Rome, Italy. It was built as a gift for the people in 72 ad and was completed in 80 ad. They did many things there but mostly venationes (hunts) and the munera (gladiatorial games). It must have been well built because it stayed in service for four and a half centuries. It also survived throught a fire caused by a lightning bolt and many large earthquakes. Also it is still around today more than 1900 years later. One day I hope to go there and get the feel for how life was 1900 years ago.

properties.name: Grand Canyon
properties.description: Posted by BigbcaliforniaThe Grand Canyon is located in Arizona. It is is a steep-sided gorge carved by the Colorado River. It\'s a beautiful place for a family trip. Not only is it senic but they have hiking and mountain biking trails. My family is thinking about go to the Grand Canyon this year for vacation. I realy hope we go because i t looks like a fun place to go. I hope it\'s as cool as it is in the pictures.

properties.name: Hiroshima, Japan
properties.description: Posted by BigbHiroshima, Japan is where the U.S. dropped an atomic bomb during WW2. It affected many peoples lives from soldiers to the people living in Hiroshima at the time the bomb was dropped. It was dropped on August 6, 1945 and was nicknamed "Little Boy". It killed over 140,000 at the time. Later it killed over 60,000 people due to cancer and other long term affects. In my opinion I think dropping the bomb was a good idea.

properties.name: Kwajalein
properties.description: Posted by BigbMy mother lived on Kwajalein with her family when she was in high-school. She lived there because her father liked to travel and he had an opportunity to be the islands elementary school principal. When she lived there it was being used as a military base. This is why almost half the island is made up of an airport. She said life there was very different than life in America. They didn\'t have cars, a cafeteria at there school or even telephones. She always tells me about it and about the time she accidentaly pierced her friends ear with a fishing hook while out fishing. My moms always talking about going back to the island and connecting with her old friends.

properties.name: Montello WI.
properties.description: Posted by BigbThis is where my Grandma lives. It\'s a small town in Wisconsin, but it\'s nice and quiet. There\'s alot of hunting done there for deer and turkey, so you always see deer out in fields. There are some realy cool things there such as an old granite quary, a huge Tru Value store, and lots of rivers and lakes for fishing in. All of my moms family lives up there and they live pretty close together. My mom\'s family consists of three aunts and uncles, and seven cousins. I love going up there but we usually only go once a year.

properties.name: SOUTHPOLE
properties.description: Posted by BigbANTARCTICA

properties.name: Soldier Field
properties.description: Posted by Bigb This is my favorite NFL Football team\'s stadium. It\'s located in Chicago, Illinois. They began building it in 1922 and it was completed in 1928. Later in 2002 they began to reconstruc it. It was finished in 2003 and is now a world class stadium. One day i hope to go to a bear\'s game in their home stadium. I\'ve never been to a football game in the snow and it snows alot at Soldier Field. The fans are also crazy and the players are beasts.

properties.name: The Pond
properties.description: Posted by BigbThis is the pond behind my house. I go fishing there all the time with my boys C-Dogg and Cody. I\'ve caught many bass there and on ocasion blue gills and gators. I\'ve been fishing there ever since I moved into my new house and that was eleven years ago. The only downside to fishing there is that you have to walk on an old trail through the woods to get there. It\'s all worth it though.
